projects.title: 200 Amp Panel Upgrade
projects.description: Upgraded a 100A panel to 200A to support a home addition and EV charger. New Square D panel with whole-home surge protection.

projects.title: Whole Home Rewiring
projects.description: Complete rewiring of a 1965 home with aluminum wiring. Upgraded to copper throughout with AFCI protection on all circuits.

projects.title: EV Charger Installation
projects.description: Tesla Wall Connector installation with dedicated 60A circuit. Included panel upgrade and conduit run to detached garage.

projects.title: Landscape Lighting Design
projects.description: Custom low-voltage landscape lighting for a luxury property. Path lights, uplights, and accent lighting with smart controls.

projects.title: Commercial Office Buildout
projects.description: Complete electrical buildout for a 3,000 sq ft professional office. Data cabling, LED lighting, and emergency circuits.

projects.title: Whole Home Generator
projects.description: Generac 22kW whole home standby generator with automatic transfer switch. Never lose power during monsoon season again.
